name: Reuben Sandwich II
author: COLETTE G.
summary: These sandwiches are really delicious and easy to make. They are one of my family's fix-it-quick favorites. I like to serve them with big bowls of steaming vegetable soup and dill pickles on the side. Enjoy!
directions: Preheat a large skillet or griddle on medium heat
Lightly butter one side of bread slices
Spread non-buttered sides with Thousand Island dressing
On 4 bread slices, layer 1 slice Swiss cheese, 2 slices corned beef, 1/4 cup sauerkraut and second slice of Swiss cheese
Top with remaining bread slices, buttered sides out
Grill sandwiches until both sides are golden brown, about 5 minutes per side
